title: RADS error AGAIN
body:
I had RADS error a few days ago so I tried everything online and somehow magically fixed it. However, the error appears again now, and I have no other way to fix it. {{summoner:3}} 
This error has been five years(?) since its first appearance. I don't understand how this problem is still not fixed.{{summoner:31}}

replies.body: Can you specify *which specific* RADS error you're running into?
